mapper.insert: insert into biz_po_zamzar_history ( po_id, parse_date, job_id, response_content, success, error_message ) values ( #{poId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responseContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{success,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{errorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
